pages.text: The Easton - Rooftop Pool + Lounge located in Fort Lauderdale, FL. Feel free to contact us for information and rentals. Book a reservation: 954-715-2617.
Discover a vibrant rooftop bar in Fort Lauderdale at The Easton. Enjoy stunning views, crafted cocktails, and a chic atmosphere. Elevate your experience today!

Saturday Splash Pool Parties
The Easton Rooftop
Elevate your weekend with a rooftop pool party in downtown Fort Lauderdale. Enjoy music by iHeartRadio and Y100’s DJ GQ with weekly themes! Sip and swim at our Fort Lauderdale rooftop pool party every weekend! Featuring live poolside DJs, drink specials, pool side bites menu and various floaties. Pool towels are provided.
